text: the man who bores out the big foolish giant
men who were childlike for their own amusement
grown - up people who have not forgotten how they once were children
the boy who is kind to beasts , and polite , and generous , and brave
a child who killed a very tall man merely because Jack killed the giants , or who was unkind to his stepmother , if he had one , because , in fairy tales , the stepmother is often disagreeable
